[[Windows Vista]] with [[Windows Vista Service Pack 1|Service Pack 1]]
[[Windows 7]]{{Cite web |url = http://www.nero.com/eng/nero10-system-requirements.html |title = Nero Multimedia Suite 10 â System Requirements |work = Nero AG website |publisher = Nero AG |accessdate = 17 December 2010 }} |platform = [[IA-32]] and [[x86-64]] |size = 355 [[Megabyte|MB]] |language = English, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Thai and Turkish{{Cite web |url = http://www.nero.com/eng/nero10-supported-languages.html |title = Languages supported by Nero 10 |work = Nero AG Official Website |publisher = Nero AG |accessdate = 17 December 2010 }} |status = Active |genre = [[Optical disc authoring software]] |license = [[Proprietary software|Proprietary]] [[commercial software]] |website = {{URL|http://www.nero.com}} }} '''Nero Multimedia Suite''' is a popular [[software suite]] for [[Microsoft Windows]] by [[Nero AG]] (formerly Ahead Software).{{Cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/eng/company-history.html |title=History of Nero AG |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG |accessdate=20 October 2009 }} Version 10 of this product was released in April 2010.{{Cite news |url = http://www.nero.com/eng/pressreleases.html?id=1800 |title = Nero Multimedia Suite 10 Now Available |work = Nero Press Releases |publisher = Nero AG |location = Karlsbad, Germany |date = 12 April 2010 |accessdate = 17 December 2010 }} == Included products == The following applications are included in Nero 11 {{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/nero9-applications-included.html |title=Applications included in Nero 11 Suite |accessdate=2009-10-20 |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG}}{{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/nero9-features.html |title=Nero 10 Features |accessdate=2009-03-19 |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG}}: ;Disc authoring * ''[[Nero Burning ROM]]'': a well-known [[optical disc authoring software|optical disc authoring program]] by Nero AG and one of its first products. * ''Nero Express'': a simplified incarnation of Nero Burning ROM targeted at beginners. * ''Nero CoverDesigner'': enables users to design and print disc covers. * ''Nero BurnRights'': enables administrators to assign required drive access rights to other users. * ''Nero DiscSpeed'': a disc speed measurement and performance diagnostics tool. * ''Nero Info Tool'': helps extracting useful system information related to disc authoring. * ''Nero DiscCopy Gadget'': a gadget that allows users to perform simple disc burning operations (only for [[Windows Vista]], [[Windows 7]] or later). * ''Nero RescueAgent'': helps recovering files from damaged or partially unreadable media and restoring files that were accidentally deleted. ;Video authoring {{anchor|Nero Video Authoring Tools}} * ''Nero Vision'': [[video editing software]] tool capable of mixing video clips and [[DVD authoring|authoring DVDs]]. The DVDs produced with the software are compatible with a large number of DVD Players.{{citation needed|date=January 2011}} * ''Nero Recode'': converts video files and non-copyrighted video DVDs into [[Nero Digital]] format, dramatically reducing their size while maintaining the quality.{{citation needed|date=January 2011}} Also allows recoding of non-copyrighted video DVDs to fit onto a smaller DVD format. ;Data backup * ''Nero BackItUp'': a system [[backup]] utility. It was integral part of Nero 6, 7 and 8 suites.{{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/support-nero7-manuals.html |title=Nero 7 Manuals -> Nero BackItUp 2 |accessdate=2009-03-19 |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG |date=2007-03-19 }}{{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/support-nero8-manuals.html |title=Nero 8 Manuals -> Nero BackItUp 3 |accessdate=2009-03-19 |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG |date= }} With the introduction of Nero 9 Nero BackItUp 4 became a standalone backup product, while its successor, Nero BackItUp 5, was the main application of Nero BackItUp & Burn {{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/backitup-and-burn-introduction.html |title=Nero - Nero BackItUp 4 Introduction |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG |accessdate=2009-03-19 }} This product was later on re-integrated in Nero Multimedia Suite 10. ;Audio editing * ''Nero Wave Editor'': audio editing tool capable of recording, trimming, filtering, mixing and exporting audio. * ''Nero SoundTrax'': [[Multitrack recording|multi-track]] [[Audio mixing (recorded music)|audio mixing]] tool capable of creating and exporting audio mixes. ;Removed tools * ''Nero ImageDrive'': a [[virtual drive]] utility that allows mounting various [[disk image|disk image files]], thus presenting them as physical media to other applications. This tool is no longer included in Nero 9. ==Naming conventions== The suite's name "Nero" is followed by its major version number and a catchphrase. The latter might vary by region (e.g. "Nero 7 Ultra Edition Enhanced" in the [[United States]], "Nero 7 Premium Reloaded" in the [[United Kingdom]] and [[Australia]]), although the name of core program remains [[Nero Burning ROM]].{{cite web |url=http://www.nero.com/enu/nero9-applications-included.html |title=Applications included in Nero 9 Suite |accessdate=2009-03-19 |work=Nero AG Official Website |publisher=Nero AG |quote=''Nero Burning ROM is the professional solution for burning your audio, data, and video discs, backing up entire discs, and much more. Features many advanced settings and options and supports a wide range of formats.'' }} The most commonly available versions of Nero are the [[Original equipment manufacturer#Software|OEM suites]], which are bundled with many [[optical disc recorder]]s. Some of these suites include only the simplified Nero Express, leaving out Nero Burning ROM.{{cite news |url=http://pcworld.about.com/news/Mar152005id119955.htm |title=The Skinny on Burner Bundles |first=Melissa J |last=Perenson |date=2005-03-15 |publisher=[[PC World (magazine)|PC World]] |accessdate=2009-03-19}} ==See also== * [[Nero AG]] * [[Nero Burning ROM]] ** [[Nero Linux]] * [[Nero Digital]] * [[Disk image emulator]] * [[List of optical disc authoring software]] ==Notes and references== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.nero.com/ Official Website] {{Optical disc image software}} [[Category:Optical disc authoring software]] [[Category:Shareware]] [[Category:Windows CD/DVD writing software]] [[Category:Linux CD/DVD writing software]] [[ar:ÙÙØ±Ù]] [[cs:Nero Burning ROM]] [[de:Nero Burning ROM]] [[fr:Nero Burning ROM]] [[it:Nero (software)]] [[nl:Nero Burning ROM]] [[ja:Nero Burning ROM]] [[no:Nero Burning ROM]] [[pl:Nero Burning ROM]] [[pt:Nero (software)]] [[fi:Nero Burning ROM]] [[sv:Nero (datorprogram)]] [[uk:Nero Burning ROM]] [[zh:Nero (è½¯ä»¶å¥ä»¶)]]
